code: import axios from"axios";import{base_url}from"../../utils/baseUrl";import{config}from"../../utils/axiosconfig";const getBlogs=async()=>{const response=await axios.get("".concat(base_url,"blog"));return response.data;};const createBlog=async blog=>{const response=await axios.post("".concat(base_url,"blog/"),blog,config);return response.data;};const updateBlog=async blog=>{const response=await axios.put("".concat(base_url,"blog/").concat(blog.id),{title:blog.blogData.title,description:blog.blogData.description,category:blog.blogData.category,images:blog.blogData.images},config);return response.data;};const getBlog=async id=>{const response=await axios.get("".concat(base_url,"blog/").concat(id),config);return response.data;};const deleteBlog=async id=>{const response=await axios.delete("".concat(base_url,"blog/").concat(id),config);return response.data;};export const blogService={getBlogs,createBlog,getBlog,updateBlog,deleteBlog};
